a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of land area used for agriculture
The share of land area used for agriculture, measured as a percentage of total land area. Agricultural land refers
to the share of land area that is arable, under permanent crops, and under permanent pastures.
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
